content: do i like snails nope do i like slugs nope but do i like goomy yes very much so and i hope you do too materials to make goomy you will need a crochet hook 2 5mm light purple dark purple and green yarn as well as small bits of black thread for the eyes and mouth a tapestry needle and scissors stuffing a stitch marker to help you keep track of the start of the round please note that you can make goomy using any size crochet hook and yarn weight for a smaller or bigger result using dk yarn and a 2 5mm crochet hook goomy should be about 10cm tall stitches & abbreviations the pattern is written using us crochet terms in continuous spirals you will need to know the following kinds of stitches to make him magic_ring magic_ring single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet tc decrease decrease preferably using the invisible decrease method increase increase slip_stitch sl crocheting in back loops blo and front loops flo if you like what i m doing please consider following me over at twitter @rinamogrynaart and/or supporting me on ko-fi @rinamogryna <3
